abilities.name: Slice
abilities.description: Melee basic attack dealing {damage} {attr:physdmg}.
abilities.shortDescription: • Basic Attack: {damage} {attr:physdmg}

abilities.name: Blade Siphon
abilities.description:
Active: Countess quickly spins, causing {damage} {attr:endmg} in a circle around her.  

Passive: Countess regains {maxhealthpercent}% of her {attr:hp} every time she kills a Minion and {maxhealthpercenthero}% of her {attr:hp} if she kills an enemy Hero.
abilities.shortDescription:
• AOE: {damage} {attr:endmg}
• Passive: Restores {maxhealthpercent}% {attr:hp} per minion killed and {maxhealthpercenthero}% {attr:hp} per hero killed

abilities.name: Shadow Slip
abilities.description: Countess targets a nearby enemy and blinks to it, dealing {damage} {attr:endmg} and applying a ({movespeed} {attr:spd}) {status:slow} for {slowdur}s.  If the target is a minion it is executed. Retrigger within {duration}s to return to original position.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Blink to Enemy: {damage} {attr:endmg}, Retrigger within {duration}s to return
• {status:slow} ({movespeed}  {attr:spd}) for {slowdur}s

abilities.name: Dark Tide
abilities.description: Countess sends out a roiling cloud of darkness in front of her, dealing {damage} {attr:endmg} to all enemies in the Area of Effect.
abilities.shortDescription: • AOE: {damage} {attr:endmg}

abilities.name: Feast
abilities.description: Countess jumps to a nearby enemy Hero, forcing them to look at her and stunning them for .75s before dealing {damage} {attr:endmg}. Countess is locked down for the duration of the attack.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Leap to Targeted Enemy Hero: {damage} {attr:endmg}
• Stun for .75s

abilities.name: Plasma Bolt
abilities.description: Ranged basic attack dealing {damage} {attr:physdmg}.
abilities.shortDescription: • Basic Attack: {damage} {attr:physdmg}

abilities.name: Move Along
abilities.description: Deals {damage} {attr:endmg} to heroes and displaces all enemies in range. Displaced enemies are moved, but their abilities are not interrupted.
abilities.shortDescription: • Knockaway: {damage} {attr:endmg}

abilities.name: Buckshot
abilities.description: Fires a blast in a cone that deals {damage} {attr:endmg} and shreds {attr:physar} by {physarmor} for {duration} seconds.
abilities.shortDescription:
• AOE Cone: {damage} {attr:endmg} 
• {physarmor} {attr:physar} Shred, {duration}s

abilities.name: Static Trap
abilities.description:
Murdock throws a trap on the ground that activates after 3.25 seconds. Enemy heroes stepping on the trap will take {damage} {attr:endmg} and be rooted for 1.1/1.4/1.7/2.0 seconds. 

The traps last for 30/40/50/60 seconds, and there can be 1/1/2/3 placed in the world at once. Traps may not be placed on top of each other.

abilities.name: Long Arm of the Law
abilities.description: Unlimited range laser blast that can be shot through anything, ignores Hero  {attr:enar} and deals {damage} {attr:endmg}

abilities.name: Swipe
abilities.description: Melee basic attack dealing {damage} {attr:physdmg}.
abilities.shortDescription: • Basic Attack: {damage} {attr:physdmg}

abilities.name: Pounce
abilities.description: Rampage leaps, dealing {damage} {attr:endmg} to all nearby enemies when he lands. Swipe causes Rampage to slam down early.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Leap Attack (1000u Range)
• {damage} {attr:endmg} on landing
• Swipe to land early

abilities.name: Boulder Throw
abilities.description: Rampage throws a boulder that deals {damage} {attr:endmg} and stuns enemy heroes for 1.4/1.6/1.8/2 seconds. Enemy minions hit by the boulder will be displaced and stunned. On activation Rampage has 5 seconds to confirm the ability. If not confirmed in the time window the ability will cancel automatically. Canceling the ability will consume the energy cost.

abilities.name: King of the Jungle
abilities.description: Passive: Gain +{maxhealth}/s {attr:hpreg}, plus an additional +{jungleregenamount}/s while in Jungle.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Passive: +{maxhealth}/s {attr:hpreg}
• Additional +{jungleregenamount}/s in Jungle

abilities.name: Enraged
abilities.description: Rampage becomes enraged, gaining {maxhealth}/s {attr:hpreg} for the next {duration} seconds. Pounce range is greatly increased. Boulder Throw can be thrown quickly, but at shorter range. Can be turned off early by retriggering the ability.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Buff: {maxhealth}/s {attr:hpreg} for {duration}s
• Pounce range increased (3300u)
• Boulder Throw is instant

abilities.name: Frozen Sword
abilities.description: Melee basic attack dealing {damage} {attr:physdmg}.
abilities.shortDescription: • Basic Attack: {damage} {attr:physdmg}

abilities.name: Frozen Simulacrum
abilities.description: Aurora leaps 700 units in the direction she is moving, leaving behind an icy statue of herself. The replica will draw aggro from enemy minions and towers, and stays in the world for {movespeed} seconds.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Directional Leap (700u Range)
• Leaves behind ice statue that draws aggro from minions and towers for {movespeed}s

abilities.name: Glacial Charge
abilities.description: Aurora dashes forward ({movespeed}u Range), leaving behind her a trail of ice that other heroes can walk on. She deals {damage} {attr:endmg} to any enemy she dashes through.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Dash ({movespeed}u Range): {damage} {attr:endmg}
• Creates walkable ice trail

abilities.name: Hoarfrost
abilities.description:
Aurora creates a ring of hoarfrost on the ground around her. Touching the ring deals {damage} {attr:endmg} and applies a {status:root} for 0.75/1/1.25/1.5 seconds. 

The ring remains in the world for {shield} seconds
abilities.shortDescription:
• AOE Ring: {damage} {attr:endmg} and {movespeed}s {status:root} if touched 
• Ring duration: {shield}s

abilities.name: Cryoseism
abilities.description:
Aurora freezes an area, applying a {shield} {attr:spd} {status:slow} to all enemies for {movespeed} seconds. 

After {explodetime} seconds, the ice on the enemies explodes, stunning the target for {stundur} second and causing {damage} {attr:endmg} in a small AOE around each target. 

Enemies inside the explosion AOE's will have a new explosion applied to them.
abilities.shortDescription:
• AOE {status:slow}: {shield} {attr:spd} for {movespeed}s 
• After {explodetime}s, {status:stun} for {stundur}s and explode for {damage} {attr:endmg}

abilities.name: Cutting Edge
abilities.description: Melee basic attack dealing {damage} {attr:physdmg}.
abilities.shortDescription: • Basic Attack: {damage} {attr:physdmg}

abilities.name: Rushing Beat
abilities.description: Shinbi dashes forward {movespeed} units, passing through enemies, dealing {damage} {attr:endmg}. Retrigger within {shield} seconds to dash a second time.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Dash ({movespeed}u Range): {damage} {attr:endmg}
• Retrigger within {shield}s to dash again

abilities.name: Line Tempo
abilities.description: Shinbi summons a Spirit Wolf that runs {movespeed} units in a straight line, passes through minions, deals {damage} {attr:endmg}, and explodes on contact with an enemy hero.
abilities.shortDescription: • Line Attack ({movespeed}u Range): {damage} {attr:endmg}

abilities.name: Circle Rhythm
abilities.description:
Shinbi summons 4 Spirit Wolves that circle her for 4 seconds, dealing {damage} {attr:endmg} per second in an AOE. 

Each hit restores Shinbi's {attr:hp} for {maxhealth} plus {maxhealthpercent}% of your Power from cards, and can heal up to 4 times.
abilities.shortDescription:
• AOE: {damage}/s {attr:endmg} over 4s
• Damage restores {attr:hp} for {maxhealth} + {maxhealthpercent}% Power, up to 4 times

abilities.name: All-Kill!
abilities.description:
Passive: All of Shinbi’s abilities apply +1 Wolf Stack per hit to enemy heroes, building up to 8 stacks. Stacks last for {stackduration} seconds, and the duration resets when new stacks are applied.

Active: Shinbi summons a pack of Spirit Wolves to attack the closest target with the highest number of Wolf Stacks, sending one wolf for every stack. Each wolf deals {damage} {attr:endmg}.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Active: {damage} {attr:endmg} per Wolf Stack on nearest enemy with highest stacks
• Passive: +1 Wolf Stack per Ability Hit, up to 8 stacks for {stackduration}s

abilities.name: Plasma Blast
abilities.description: Ranged basic attack dealing {damage} {attr:physdmg}.
abilities.shortDescription: • Basic Attack: {damage} {attr:physdmg}

abilities.name: Seek & Destroy
abilities.description: Gadget deploys an airborne bot projectile that can be reactivated to stop in place and begin dealing {damage} {attr:endmg} over {duration} seconds to enemies in range, while applying a {movespeed} {attr:spd} {status:slow}.
abilities.shortDescription:
• AOE: {damage} {attr:endmg} over {duration}s
• {status:slow} ({movespeed} {attr:spd})
• Retrigger to stop on command

abilities.name: Sticky Mine
abilities.description: Gadget launches a mine projectile that will attach to any unit within the area (enemies are prioritized). After {duration} seconds, the mine explodes, dealing {damage} {attr:endmg}.
abilities.shortDescription:
• AOE Prox Mine: {damage} {attr:endmg} after {duration}s
• Sticks to closest Unit, Enemies first

abilities.name: Speed Gate
abilities.description: Gadget deploys a gate that gives allies a +{movespeed} {attr:spd} boost for {duration} seconds and deals up to {damage} {attr:endmg} to enemies inside of it.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Haste (+{movespeed} {attr:spd}) Allies for {duration}s
• {damage} {attr:endmg} for Enemies

abilities.name: Tesla Dome
abilities.description: Gadget's Tesla Dome applies five ticks of damage over {duration} seconds to all enemies in the area totaling {damage} {attr:endmg} and slowing them by {movespeed} {attr:spd} for {maxhealth} seconds per tick. After each tick, the damage is increased by 75%.
abilities.shortDescription:
• AOE: {damage} {attr:endmg} over {duration}s
• {status:slow} ({movespeed} {attr:spd})  for {maxhealth} seconds on damage tick
• Damage increased by 75% per tick

abilities.name: Wallop
abilities.description: Melee basic attack dealing {damage} {attr:physdmg}.
abilities.shortDescription: • Basic Attack: {damage} {attr:physdmg}

abilities.name: Thunk
abilities.description: Throw a drumstick that deals {damage} {attr:endmg} and stuns enemies for {movespeed} seconds.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Projectile Throw: {damage} {attr:endmg}
• Stun for {stunduration}s

abilities.name: March!
abilities.description: Grants Narbash and nearby allies +{movespeed}  {attr:spd} for 3s.
abilities.shortDescription:
• AOE Speed Buff
• Haste ({movespeed} {attr:spd}) nearby Allies for 3s

abilities.name: Song of My People
abilities.description: Toggle: Aura that grants +{maxhealth} {attr:hpreg}. Uses {energycost} {attr:mp} every second while active.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Toggle AOE Aura
• +{maxhealth} {attr:hpreg} for nearby Allies
• {energycost} {attr:mp} Mana per 1s while active

abilities.name: Crash Bang Boom!
abilities.description: A deafening ruckus AOE that knocks up enemies and applies a {movespeed} {attr:spd} {status:slow}. Deals {damage} {attr:endmg} over 3s.
abilities.shortDescription:
• AOE: {damage} {attr:endmg} over 3s
• Slow ({movespeed} {attr:spd})
• End with Knockup

abilities.name: Hack
abilities.description: Melee basic attack dealing {damage} {attr:physdmg}.
abilities.shortDescription: • Basic Attack: {damage} {attr:physdmg}

abilities.name: Ambush
abilities.description: Khaimera leaps to a target enemy hero, dealing {damage} {attr:endmg} and applying a {movespeed} {attr:spd} {status:slow} in a small AOE. Khaimera is granted {stacks} stacks of Spirit Regeneration upon activation.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Leap to Targeted Enemy Hero: {damage} {attr:endmg} in AOE
• {status:slow} ({movespeed} {attr:spd}) for {duration}s
• Grants {stacks} Stacks of Spirit Regeneration

abilities.name: Unleash
abilities.description: Upon activation, Hack attack speed is maxed out for the next {numattacks} attacks within 5 seconds. Hack Damage scaling is reduced to {maxhealthpercent}% during these attacks, increasing each time the ability is leveled up.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Hack Buff: Max {attr:atkspd}, next {numattacks} attacks within 5s
• Damage scaling reduced to {maxhealthpercent}%

abilities.name: Spirit Regeneration
abilities.description: Passive: Khaimera's Health Regen is boosted by +{maxhealth} for {stackduration} seconds each time he lands a Hack,  Ambush, or Cull attack on an enemy. This effect stacks, and increases in effectiveness each time the ability is leveled up.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Passive: Gain +{maxhealth} Health Regen on hit with Hack, Ambush, or Cull
• Stacks on each hit, lasts {stackduration}s

abilities.name: Cull
abilities.description: After a brief channel, Khaimera stuns and causes {damage} {attr:endmg} to a targeted enemy hero. Nearby enemies are displaced and receive a 60% {attr:spd} {status:slow} for {slowlong} seconds. Khaimera is granted {stacks} stacks of Spirit Regeneration upon activation.

abilities.name: Punch
abilities.description: Melee basic attack dealing {damage} {attr:physdmg}.
abilities.shortDescription: • Basic Attack: {damage} {attr:physdmg}

abilities.name: Bulwark
abilities.description:
Steel deploys his shield, crouching behind it for {duration} seconds. The shield blocks 60/70/80/90% of all incoming damage that passes through the shield. AoE {attr:endmg} is not blocked.

Retriggering or attacking will cancel the ability early.
abilities.shortDescription: • Block {maxhealthpercent}% incoming non-AoE Damage for {duration}s

abilities.name: Bull Rush
abilities.description: Steel charges forward 1600 units, dealing {damage} {attr:endmg} and knocking back any enemy heroes he hits. Enemy minions will be knocked up.

abilities.name: Force Shield
abilities.description: Steel creates an energy barrier that blocks enemy projectiles and applies a {slowamount} {attr:spd} {status:slow} to them for {slowdur} seconds if they touch it. The wall lasts for {duration} seconds.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Blocks Enemy projectiles for {duration}s
• {status:slow} ({slowamount} {attr:spd}) on Enemy touch for {slowdur}s

abilities.name: Shield Slam
abilities.description: Steel slams down at a targeted area, knocking up all enemies, dealing {damage} {attr:endmg} and also applying a {stun} second {status:stun}.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Leap to AOE: {damage} {attr:endmg}
• {status:knockup} and {stun}s {status:stun} on hit

abilities.name: Burst Fire
abilities.description: Ranged basic attack dealing {damage} {attr:physdmg}.
abilities.shortDescription: • Basic Attack: {damage} {attr:physdmg}

abilities.name: Void Bomb
abilities.description: AOE bomb that detonates after 1.1s, dealing {damage} {attr:endmg}. Restores {movespeed} {attr:mp} for each enemy hit.
abilities.shortDescription:
• AOE: {damage} {attr:endmg} after 1.1s
• Restores +{movespeed} {attr:mp} per Enemy hit

abilities.name: Seismic Assault
abilities.description: Line of energy that knocks up, deals {damage} {attr:endmg} and applies a {movespeed}s {status:stun}.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Line Attack (2000u Range): {damage} {attr:endmg}
• Knockup Enemies, {status:stun} for {movespeed}s

abilities.name: Void Drone
abilities.description: Large AOE drone that drains {maxhealthpercent}% {attr:mp}/second from enemy heroes. The drone will attack enemies within its zone whenever they use an ability, dealing {damage} {attr:endmg}. Enemies can destroy the drone. Lasts {movespeed} seconds.
abilities.shortDescription:
• AOE Drone: Drains {maxhealthpercent}% {attr:mp}/s from Enemies, lasts {movespeed}s unless destroyed
• {damage} {attr:endmg} to Enemies that use abilities within the AOE

abilities.name: Neural Disruptor
abilities.description: Deal {movespeed} {attr:endmg} per point of target's missing {attr:mp}. Each point of power increases the base multipler by {maxhealthpercent}%.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Single Target: {movespeed} {attr:endmg} per point of Enemy's missing {attr:mp}
• Each point of power increases the base multipler by {maxhealthpercent}%

abilities.name: Dagger
abilities.description: Ranged basic attack dealing {damage} {attr:physdmg}.
abilities.shortDescription: • Basic Attack: {damage} {attr:physdmg}

abilities.name: Mark
abilities.description: Morigesh selects a target hero within range, dealing {damage} {attr:endmg} to the hero. Her doll takes the shape of the hero, marking them as her target wherever they go in the map.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Mark Target: {damage} {attr:endmg}
• No line-of-sight restrictions

abilities.name: Hive
abilities.description: Morigesh throws a hive of insects that explodes in an AOE, deals {damage} {attr:endmg} on direct hit, and applies a stack of {damage} {attr:endmg} per tick over {duration} seconds to enemies in the AOE. Enemies are slowed briefly on each tick of damage and Morigesh gains vision of the affected targets. Damage and vision last {shield} seconds on a Marked target.
abilities.shortDescription:
• AOE: {damage} {attr:endmg} on hit, {damage} {attr:endmg} per tick over {duration}s
• Grants vision
• Lasts {shield}s on a Marked target

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.description: Morigesh transforms into a swarm of insects for {duration} seconds, granting her a {attr:spd} boost and the ability to pass through enemies. Passing through an enemy deals {damage} {attr:endmg} and grants her 1 stack of +{maxhealth} Health Regen for {stackduration} seconds. Stacks are limited to {stacksmax} and enemies can only be hit once.

abilities.name: Curse
abilities.description: If Morigesh has a valid Mark, she raises her dagger and stabs her doll, dealing {damage} {attr:endmg} to her target. While Morigesh is channeling, the Marked hero will be warned that she is about to strike.
abilities.shortDescription: • Strike Marked Enemy: {damage} {attr:endmg}

abilities.name: Whip Crack
abilities.description: Melee basic attack dealing {damage} {attr:physdmg}. Yin's whip has a longer range and narrower width than common melee attacks.
abilities.shortDescription: • Basic Attack: {damage} {attr:physdmg}

abilities.name: Backlash
abilities.description: Yin cracks her whip, creating a sphere of pressure around her for 0.5 seconds. If enemy projectiles hit the sphere, they are reflected back toward the enemy who fired them.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Reflects enemy projectiles
• Reflection sphere last 0.5 seconds

abilities.name: Lash Kick
abilities.description: Yin swings her whip {movespeed} units to pull herself to a target, jumps off of their head for {damage} {attr:endmg}, then lands in the direction of her choice. This can be performed on Allies, Minions, and Enemies.

abilities.name: Windburn
abilities.description: Yin extends her whip, increasing the range of her basic attack to {movespeed} units and gains 100% Cleave for {maxhealth} seconds.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Extend Basic Attack range to {movespeed}u
• Gain 100% Cleave
• {maxhealth}s duration

abilities.name: Quelling Gale
abilities.description: Yin surrounds herself in gale winds, displacing all enemies within range. For {maxhealth} seconds after, the AOE will apply a {movespeed} {attr:spd} slow to enemies. Projectiles that travel through it are halted. Has a radius of {radius} units.
abilities.shortDescription:
• AOE Knockaway
• Slow ({movespeed} {attr:spd})  enemies and projectiles
• Lasts {maxhealth}s

abilities.name: Molotov
abilities.description: Deals {damage} {attr:physdmg} and leaves a pool of fire on the ground where it lands that applies {status:burn} to enemies that touch it. The molotov will also ignite any Oil patches it hits.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Basic Attack: {damage} {attr:physdmg}
• Fire stays on ground, Burns Enemies, Ignites Oil

abilities.name: Oil Slick
abilities.description: Scorch gains +{movespeed} {attr:spd} for {maxhealth} seconds and leaves a trail of flammable Oil behind him. The trail can be ignited with fire to apply {status:burn}.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Haste (+{movespeed} {attr:spd}) for {maxhealth}s
• Leaves Trail of flammable Oil behind

abilities.name: Flame Turret
abilities.description: Iggy throws out a turret that deals {damage} {attr:endmg} over {duration} seconds. Turrets have limited fuel and will prioritize targets that Iggy is damaging. Leveling up this ability will allow Iggy to place more turrets in the world at once.
abilities.shortDescription:
• AOE Turret: {damage}{attr:endmg} over {duration}s, Ignites Oil
• Turrets that may exist at once: {movespeed}

abilities.name: Oil Spill
abilities.description: Scorch spits out a blob that applies Oil which deals {damage} {attr:endmg} and applies {status:burn} when ignited by Fire.
abilities.shortDescription:
• AOE Oil Patch
• Ignite for {damage}{attr:endmg} and apply 1 Stack of {status:burn}

abilities.name: Flame Belch
abilities.description: Scorch spews flames from its mouth dealing {damage} {attr:endmg} over {duration} seconds and applying {status:burn}. At the end of the duration, Scorch belches and enemies in the cone are knocked back.
abilities.shortDescription:
• {damage} {attr:endmg} over {duration}s
• Knockback after duration or Retrigger

abilities.name: Whip
abilities.description: Basic melee attack dealing {damage} {attr:physdmg}.
abilities.shortDescription: • Basic Attack: {damage} {attr:physdmg}

abilities.name: Riplash
abilities.description: Long range skill shot that pulls an enemy Hero or minion directly to Riktor. Deals {damage} {attr:endmg} on hit, and interrupts any channeled ability. Max range of {movespeed} units.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Chain Pull ({movespeed}u Range): {damage} {attr:endmg}
• Interrupts channeled abilities

abilities.name: Shock Therapy
abilities.description: Once activated, next hit with Whip does {damage} additional {attr:endmg} and applies a {status:slnc} and {movespeed} {attr:spd} {status:slow} for {silencedur}s.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Whip Buff: +{damage} {attr:endmg}
• {status:slnc} and {status:slow} ({movespeed} {attr:spd}) for {silencedur}s

abilities.name: Electrocute
abilities.description: AOE around Riktor that does {damage} total {attr:endmg} over 5 seconds.
abilities.shortDescription: • Aura: {damage} {attr:endmg} over 5s

abilities.name: Skewer
abilities.description: Riktor targets a wedge in front of him and skewers that area dealing {attr:endmg} and applying a {status:stun} for {duration}.  After the stun, Riktor rips his Skewers out dealing more {attr:endmg}. Total damage adds up to {damage}.
abilities.shortDescription:
• {damage} {attr:endmg} (50% at start, 50% at end)
• Stun for {duration}s

abilities.name: Punch
abilities.description: Melee basic attack dealing {damage} {attr:physdmg}.
abilities.shortDescription: • Basic Attack: {damage} {attr:physdmg}

abilities.name: Forward Crunch!
abilities.description:
Dash forward 1250 units, dealing {damage} {attr:endmg}, stopping upon hitting an enemy hero. 

Empowered: Dash 1500 units, pushing enemy heroes on contact.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Dash (1250u): {damage} {attr:endmg}
• Empowered: Dash (1500u Range), pushing enemy heroes.

abilities.name: Left Crunch
abilities.description:
Deals {damage} {attr:endmg} to enemies with {clrating}% bonus Cleave rating. 

Empowered: Deals {eclrating}% Bonus {attr:endmg} with {maxhealthpercent}% bonus Cleave rating.
abilities.shortDescription:
• {damage} {attr:endmg} and {clrating}% bonus Cleave rating. 
• Empowered: {eclrating}% bonus {attr:endmg} and {maxhealthpercent}% bonus Cleave rating.

abilities.name: Right Crunch
abilities.description:
Deals {damage} {attr:endmg} and applies a {movespeed} {attr:spd} {status:slow}. 

Empowered: Deals {eclrating}% bonus {attr:endmg} and knocks up enemies instead of slowing them.

abilities.name: Re-Crunch
abilities.description:
Active: Instantly repeat the last ability used. 

Passive: -{cdr}s active cooldown reduction on all abilities for every Basic Attack landed.

Passive: Every third ability used will be Empowered if used within 10 seconds.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Active: Repeat the last ability used 
• Passive: -{cdr}s CDR on all abilities for each Basic Attack landed
• Passive: Every third ability is Empowered for the next 10s

abilities.name: Portal Blast
abilities.description: Ranged basic attack dealing {damage} {attr:physdmg}.
abilities.shortDescription: • Basic Attack: {damage} {attr:physdmg}

abilities.name: Burden
abilities.description: Projectile that creates a tether to an enemy hero dealing four ticks of damage for a total of {damage} {attr:endmg} while applying a {movespeed} {attr:spd} {status:slow} over a {slowlong} second duration, as long as line of sight is maintained.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Energy Tether: 4 hits of damage for a total of {damage} {attr:endmg} over {slowlong}s
• {status:slow} ({movespeed} {attr:spd})

abilities.name: Cosmic Rift
abilities.description: Meteor from the sky that deals {damage} {attr:endmg}.
abilities.shortDescription: • AOE Burst: {damage} {attr:endmg}

abilities.name: Torn Space
abilities.description: Gideon opens a portal, allowing him to quickly teleport (850/900/950/1000) units away. Friendly heroes can follow him through the portal by jumping into it.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Teleport ({movespeed}u Range)
• Portal stays open, Allies can jump through to follow

abilities.name: Black Hole
abilities.description:
Gideon rises up, creating a black hole that slowly moves enemies towards it, dealing {damage} {attr:endmg} over {duration} seconds. 

This is a channeled ability, which means it can be interrupted by Hard Crowd Control (Stuns, Pulls, etc.).
abilities.shortDescription:
• AOE: {damage}{attr:endmg} over {duration}s
• Pull to Center for duration

abilities.name: Angelic Smite
abilities.description: Melee basic attack dealing {damage} {attr:physdmg}.
abilities.shortDescription: • Basic Attack: {damage} {attr:physdmg}

abilities.name: Chastise
abilities.description: Serath sweeps her wings in front of her, dealing {damage} AOE {attr:endmg} and applying a {movespeed} {attr:spd} {status:slow} for {duration} seconds
abilities.shortDescription:
• AOE Cone: {damage} {attr:endmg} 
• {status:slow} ({movespeed} {attr:spd}) for {duration} seconds

abilities.name: Heaven's Fury
abilities.description: Serath hovers in place and hits each target in an area with a ghostly slash. Each slash does {damage} {attr:physdmg}, one target at a time, with a {castdelaydur}s delay between each attack. While attacking, she is immune to damage and crowd control.
abilities.shortDescription:
• AOE: {damage} {attr:physdmg}, {castdelaydur}s delay per target
• Immunity to damage and crowd control while attacking

abilities.name: Ascend
abilities.description: Rise into the air and then rapidly dive back down up to {movespeed} units away, dealing {damage} {attr:endmg} to the targeted area.
abilities.shortDescription:
• AOE: {damage} {attr:endmg}
• Hover & Dive: {movespeed}u Range

abilities.name: Heresy
abilities.description:
Serath lets her dark side take over for {duration} seconds. At that time, one stack of {status:burn} and one stack of {status:weak} is applied to enemies within {range} units Range. {status:burn} does {movespeed} {attr:endmg} over 3 seconds. {status:weak} will cause Enemy Damage to be {maxhealthpercent}% of normal for 3 seconds. 

Any enemies she hits with another ability during the entire {duration}s Duration will also have a {status:burn} and {status:weak} applied to them. Burning enemies take additional {attr:physdmg} if Serath hits them with a Basic Attack while this ability is active.

abilities.name: Slice
abilities.description: Melee basic attack dealing {damage} {attr:physdmg}
abilities.shortDescription: • Basic Attack: {damage} {attr:physdmg}

abilities.name: Light of the Heavens
abilities.description: Beams of light from the heavens strike Kwang and his sword. The light that hits his sword does AOE {damage} {attr:endmg} around it. The light that hits Kwang gives him {physarmor} {attr:physar} and {enarmor} {attr:enar} for {duration}s. This ability works whether or not Kwang is holding his sword.
abilities.shortDescription:
• AOE: Deals {damage} {attr:endmg} around Kwang's sword, wherever it is
• Armor Buff: +{physarmor} {attr:physar} and +{enarmor} {attr:enar} for {duration}s

abilities.name: Judgement of the Heavens
abilities.description: Kwang throws his sword to the heavens. When it lands, it deals {damage} {attr:endmg} and tethers enemies to it for {duration} seconds. The sword remains planted in the ground forever, or until the next Basic attack or the ability is Retriggered. Recalling the sword early will break the enemy tether.

abilities.name: Gift of the Heavens
abilities.description: Passive: Kwang's sword bursts with light, creating an aura around it that gives {kwanglifestealamount} {attr:lfstl} to Kwang and {lifestealamount} {attr:lfstl} to all allies in a large radius around him (2000u Range). This aura is 30% as effective for AOE damage.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Passive +{lifestealamount} {attr:lfstl} aura 
• +{kwanglifestealamount} {attr:lfstl} for Kwang
• 30% effective for AOE attacks

abilities.name: Fury of the Heavens
abilities.description: Kwang spins his blade around him in an AOE, dealing {damage} {attr:endmg} and applying a -{movespeed} {attr:spd} {status:slow} for {slowdur} seconds. If his sword has been thrown and is still out in the world, Kwang will teleport to it before he attacks.

abilities.name: Hammer
abilities.description: Melee basic attack dealing {damage} {attr:physdmg}.
abilities.shortDescription: • Basic Attack: {damage} {attr:physdmg}

abilities.name: Phantom Rush
abilities.description: Sevarog rushes forward 1000 units, gliding through any enemies in his path.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Long Range Dash (1000u Range)
• Pass through Enemies and Minions

abilities.name: Siphon
abilities.description:
Active: Sevarog deals {damage} {attr:endmg} to all enemies in the targeted area

Passive: Sevarog gains Soul Stacks for killing minions and heroes with any ability. He gains 1 Soul Stack with each minion kill and 3 per hero. 

Each Soul Stack gives Sevarog +{healthpassive} {attr:hp} and adds +{damagepassive} {attr:endmg} to his Siphon attack. 

+20/30/40/50 {attr:hp} and +10/15/20/25 bonus {attr:endmg} is also added upon reaching 20/50/90/140 Soul Stacks.

abilities.name: Subjugate
abilities.description:
Sevarog targets a circle on the ground and calls down a burst of dark energy that does {damage} {attr:endmg} and applies a {status:root} for {rootshort} second to any enemies hit. 

When the root expires, the targets will have a {slowsecondary} {attr:spd} {status:slow} for {slowlong}s.
abilities.shortDescription:
• AOE Root: {damage} {attr:endmg}
• Root for {rootshort}s, then {status:slow} ({slowsecondary} {attr:spd}) for {slowlong}s

abilities.name: Colossal Blow
abilities.description: Sevarog gives one mighty swing of his hammer, dealing {damage} {attr:endmg} in the area and knocking back enemy heroes.
abilities.shortDescription:
• AOE Wedge: {damage} {attr:endmg}
• Knockback Heroes

abilities.name: Cannon
abilities.description: Ranged attack dealing {damage} {attr:physdmg} and 10% splash damage to nearby enemies.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Basic Attack: {damage} {attr:physdmg}
• 10% Splash Damage

abilities.name: Slow Grenades
abilities.description: Howitzer fires 3 proximity bombs in an arc that explode for {damage} {attr:endmg} and applies a {movespeed} {attr:spd} {status:slow} for {slowduration} seconds.
abilities.shortDescription:
• 3 Grenades: {damage} {attr:endmg}
• {status:slow} ({movespeed} {attr:spd}) for {slowduration}s

abilities.name: R2000 Missile
abilities.description: Howitzer fires a long range rocket that deals {damage} {attr:endmg} in an area.
abilities.shortDescription: • Long Range Rocket (2500u Range): {damage} {attr:endmg} in AOE

abilities.name: Land Mine
abilities.description: Places a mine that will explode after {duration} seconds, knocking any enemies (and Howitzer) back and dealing {damage} {attr:endmg}. Ability can be reactivated to detonate early.
abilities.shortDescription:
• AOE: {damage} {attr:endmg} after {duration}s
• Knockaway Self and Enemies
• Retrigger to detonate early

abilities.name: Make it Rain
abilities.description: Howitzer rockets into the air and fires down a volley of missiles in the targeted area, causing {damage} {attr:endmg} over {damageduration} seconds. The last missile does {splitdamage}% of the total damage. Howitzer can trigger a short directional boost before coming back down by holding the movement input in the direction he'd like to boost.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Vertical Launch to Large AOE
• {damage} {attr:endmg} DOT over {damageduration}s (Last missile does {splitdamage}% of damage)

abilities.name: Doubleshot
abilities.description: Ranged basic attack dealing {damage} {attr:physdmg}.
abilities.shortDescription: • Basic Attack: {damage} {attr:physdmg}

abilities.name: Rapid Fire
abilities.description:
Twinblast rapidly shoots his Basic Attack three times, dealing 30/35/40/45% {attr:physdmg} with each shot to Heroes and Structures. Always deals 45% {attr:physdmg} to Minions.

This attack can Critically Hit and apply all other on-hit effects typical to his Basic Attack.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Triple Shot: {maxhealthpercent}% {attr:physdmg}
• 45% {attr:physdmg} to Minions.

abilities.name: Grenade!
abilities.description: Twinblast fires a grenade to a target location. After 0.4 seconds the grenade explodes, dealing {damage} {attr:endmg}. The grenades have three charges, refreshing every 14/12/10/8 seconds.

abilities.name: Rocket Dash
abilities.description: Twinblast briefly ignites his evasion thrusters, rapidly propelling him 650 units in the direction he is moving.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Short Dodge (650u Range)
• Hold Movement Input to direct

abilities.name: Ventilate
abilities.description: Twinblast converts his guns into fully automatic mode, unleashing a barrage of {numshots} bullets in 3 seconds dealing up to {damage} {attr:endmg} over the duration.
abilities.shortDescription: • Channels {numshots} Bullets over 3s dealing up to {damage} {attr:endmg}

abilities.name: Pulse Cannon
abilities.description: Ranged basic attack dealing {damage} {attr:physdmg}.
abilities.shortDescription: • Basic Attack: {damage} {attr:physdmg}

abilities.name: Deflector Shield
abilities.description: GRIM.exe activates a {duration} second duration shield that blocks the next incoming enemy ability. If the shield successfully blocks an ability, GRIM.exe regains {maxhealthpercent}% missing {attr:mp}.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Blocks next Enemy Ability 
• Duration {duration}s
• Gain {mana}% of missing {attr:mp} on successful Block

abilities.name: Displacement Blast
abilities.description: Lobbed shot that deals {damage} {attr:endmg} and quickly displaces enemies, moving them from the center of the explosion.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Lobbed AOE: {damage} {attr:endmg}
• Knockaway Enemies from center

abilities.name: Suppression Mode
abilities.description: When this ability is toggled on, Pulse Cannon attacks use {energycost} {attr:mp} per shot and apply a {movespeed} {attr:spd} {status:slow} for .8s.
abilities.shortDescription:
• {status:slow} Toggle: ({movespeed} {attr:spd} for .8s)   
• {energycost} {attr:mp} per shot

abilities.name: GTFO
abilities.description: GRIM.exe comes to a halt and locks on to an enemy hero. After a short channel, a Gyro Targeted Force Orb is launched. The orb will pass through the world and non-hero units, but can be blocked by enemy heroes and ability-generated walls. The orb deals {damage} {attr:endmg} upon hitting an enemy hero.

abilities.name: Energy Orb
abilities.description: Ranged basic attack dealing {damage} {attr:physdmg}.
abilities.shortDescription: • Basic Attack: {damage} {attr:physdmg}

abilities.name: Rocket Boots
abilities.description: Directional leap that launches Dekker high into the air.
abilities.shortDescription: • Directional Leap

abilities.name: Stasis Bomb
abilities.description: Bouncing bomb that deals {damage} {attr:endmg} and stuns in an area for {movespeed} seconds. The bomb will deal reduced damage to any enemy minions it passes through.

abilities.name: Slow Bubble
abilities.description: AOE bubble that applies a {movespeed} {attr:spd} {status:slow} to enemies and deals {damage} {attr:endmg} once it pops. Retriggering the ability will cause the bubble to pop early, for less damage.
abilities.shortDescription:
• AOE: {damage} {attr:endmg} after 3s
• {status:slow} ({movespeed} {attr:spd} ) 
• Retrigger early for less damage

abilities.name: Containment Fence
abilities.description: Circular energy fence that lasts for {movespeed} seconds. Blocks enemy projectiles, but not friendly ones. Enemy heroes who touch the walls get knocked to the center of the area. Reactivating the ability will cancel the fence early.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Circular Energy Fence
• Knock to Center on Enemy contact
• Lasts {movespeed} seconds, Retrigger to cancel

abilities.name: Slash
abilities.description: Basic attack dealing {damage} {attr:physdmg}.
abilities.shortDescription: • Basic Attack: {damage} {attr:physdmg}

abilities.name: Backflip
abilities.description: Flip into the air up to two times. Each flip costs {energycost} {attr:mp} .
abilities.shortDescription:
• Vertical Flip up to 2 times
• {energycost} {attr:mp} per flip

abilities.name: Shadow Walk
abilities.description: After a {delayduration} second channel, Kallari enters the Shadow Plane, gaining {movespeed} {attr:spd} for {maxhealth} seconds or until she uses an offensive ability. Landing a Slash while in Shadow Walk will deal {stealthmultiplier}% {attr:physdmg}.

abilities.name: Crippling Dagger
abilities.description: Kallari throws a dagger dealing {damage} {attr:endmg} and applying a {movespeed} {attr:spd} {status:slow} for {slowduration} second.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Throw: {damage} {attr:endmg}
• {status:slow} ({movespeed} {attr:spd}) for {slowduration}s

abilities.name: Death Sentence
abilities.description: Kallari applies a Death Mark to all enemy heroes for {movespeed} seconds. During that time, Kallari can reconfirm the ability to teleport to the target, dealing {damage}{attr:endmg} upon arrival.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Vision on all Enemies for {movespeed}s
• Teleport to target Enemy dealing {damage} {attr:endmg}

abilities.name: Floret
abilities.description: Ranged basic attack dealing {damage} {attr:physdmg}.
abilities.shortDescription: • Basic Attack: {damage} {attr:physdmg}

abilities.name: Untamed Growth
abilities.description: Small plant that deals {damage} {attr:endmg} in an AOE over {growduration} seconds. 50% of the damage is dealt over the duration of the ability and the final 50% in a single blow when the plant finishes growing and pops.
abilities.shortDescription: • AOE: {damage} {attr:endmg} (50% over {growduration}s, 50% after)

abilities.name: Bramble Patch
abilities.description: Line of thorny brambles that deals {damage} {attr:endmg} and applies a {slowamount} {attr:spd} {status:slow} to enemies for {duration} seconds.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Line attack: {damage} {attr:endmg}
• {status:slow} ({movespeed} {attr:spd}) for {duration}s, restarts on contact

abilities.name: Harvest Nettles
abilities.description: Long Range (2000 units) projectile that deals {damage} {attr:endmg}. Refunds {attr:mp} cost on enemy hero hit.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Long Range Attack (2000u Range): {damage} {attr:endmg}
• Refunds {attr:mp} cost on enemy hero hit

abilities.name: Fly Trap
abilities.description: A giant plant that grabs nearby enemy Heroes with its vines. After {pulldelay} seconds the vines pull the Heroes to the plant dealing {damage} {attr:endmg}. The vines break if the plant loses line of sight of the enemy.
abilities.shortDescription:
• AOE Trap: After {pulldelay}s, Pull to Center for {damage} {attr:endmg}
• Vines snap if line-of-sight broken

abilities.name: Noble Strike
abilities.description: Melee basic attack dealing {damage} {attr:physdmg}.
abilities.shortDescription: • Basic Attack: {damage} {attr:physdmg}

abilities.name: Assault the Gates
abilities.description: Greystone leaps as far as 1000 units, dealing {damage} {attr:endmg} in a small AOE when he lands.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Mid Range Leap (1000u Range)
• {damage} {attr:endmg} in small AOE

abilities.name: Make Way
abilities.description: Greystone summons a fiery whirlwind that deals a total of {damage} {attr:endmg} in an area around him over the course of {durationprimary} seconds.
abilities.shortDescription: • Whirlwind AOE: {damage} {attr:endmg} over {durationprimary}s

abilities.name: Stoic
abilities.description: Passive: Greystone has an additional +{physarmor} {attr:physar} and +{maxhealth} {attr:hp}. These amounts increase with each level of this ability.
abilities.shortDescription: • Passive: +{physarmor} {attr:physar}, +{maxhealth} {attr:hp}

abilities.name: Reforged
abilities.description:
Passive: When Greystone dies, he turns to stone. Enemies within {radius} units get a {duration}s {attr:spd} {status:slow} of between {slowamount} and {slowamount2}, depending on how close they are to Greystone. 

After 3 seconds, his spirit re-enters his body from above, giving him {maxhealthpercent}% health. He then comes back to life, dealing {damage} {attr:endmg} in the area.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Passive: On Death, Resurrect
• AOE {status:slow}: (up to {slowamount2} {attr:spd}) for {duration}s
• {damage} {attr:endmg} on landing
• {maxhealthpercent}% Health restored

abilities.name: Sweep
abilities.description: Melee basic attack dealing {damage} {attr:physdmg}.
abilities.shortDescription: • Melee Basic Attack: {damage} {attr:physdmg}

abilities.name: Conversion Shield
abilities.description: Feng Mao gives himself a +{shield} {attr:shld} that lasts for {duration} seconds.
abilities.shortDescription: • +{shield} {attr:shld} on Self for {duration}s

abilities.name: Reaping Dash
abilities.description: Feng Mao throws out an image of himself. When it collides with an enemy hero or reaches the max distance of {dashdist} units, he will teleport to the image. The image deals {damage} {attr:endmg} to all minions it passes through and a single hero it collides with. His next Sweep attack within 4 seconds gains {bonuspercent}% extra damage.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Dash ({movespeed}u Range): {damage} {attr:endmg}
• Sweep Bonus (+{maxhealthpercent}% {attr:physdmg}) within 4s of Dash

abilities.name: Hamstring
abilities.description: AOE attack that deals {damage} {attr:endmg} and applies a {slowamount} {attr:spd} {status:slow} for {slowdur} seconds.
abilities.shortDescription:
• AOE Spin: {damage} {attr:endmg}
• {status:slow} ({movespeed} {attr:spd}) for {slowdur}s

abilities.name: Earth Shatter
abilities.description: Feng Mao slams his blade on the ground dealing {damage} {attr:endmg} to all enemies in a line in front of him.
abilities.shortDescription: • AOE Wedge: {damage} {attr:endmg}

abilities.name: Orb
abilities.description: Basic ranged attack dealing {damage} {attr:physdmg}.
abilities.shortDescription: • Basic Attack: {damage} {attr:physdmg}

abilities.name: Alacrity
abilities.description: Skill shot orb that applies a +{shield} {attr:shld} and +{movespeed} {attr:spd} to the first allied hero that touches it. The speed boost lasts {durationalt} seconds.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Buff: +{shield} {attr:shld} on Ally
• Haste (+{movespeed} {attr:spd}) for {durationalt}s

abilities.name: Serenity
abilities.description: Muriel fires an orb that deals {damage} {attr:endmg} and applies a {movespeed} {attr:spd} {status:slow} for {duration} seconds.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Orb: {damage} {attr:endmg}
• Slow ({movespeed} {attr:spd}) for {duration}s

abilities.name: Consecrated Ground
abilities.description: Muriel deploys an AOE bubble that applies a +{shield} {attr:shld} to allies. After {duration} seconds, the bubble pops, dealing {damage} {attr:endmg} to enemies in the area of effect.
abilities.shortDescription:
• AOE: +{shield} {attr:shld} to Allies
• {damage} {attr:endmg} to Enemies after {duration}s

abilities.name: Reversal of Fortune
abilities.description: Muriel flies to a targeted ally anywhere on the map. The ally instantly receives a +{shield} {attr:shld}. Enemy heroes are slowed by {movespeed} {attr:spd} for {duration} as Muriel lands.

abilities.name: Bow Shot
abilities.description: Ranged basic attack dealing {damage} {attr:physdmg}.
abilities.shortDescription: • Basic Attack: {damage} {attr:physdmg}

abilities.name: Piercing Shot
abilities.description: While holding, Sparrow charges a powerful arrow that does up to {damage} {attr:endmg} to all enemies in a line, at a range of {range} units. The arrow will travel through both enemies and the world. Maximum damage will be done if charged for at least 1 second.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Long Shot ({range}u Range)
• Up to {damage} {attr:endmg} if held 1s or longer

abilities.name: Hail of Arrows
abilities.description: Sparrow rains down arrows in an area, dealing {damage} {attr:endmg} over {duration} seconds.
abilities.shortDescription: • AOE: {damage} {attr:endmg} over {duration}s

abilities.name: Relentless
abilities.description: Passive: Successive hits within 5 seconds on the same target deals an extra 3/5/7/9% Bow Shot Damage. This effect stacks up to {stacknumber} times, and is triggered by any damage Sparrow causes.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Passive: Consecutive attacks within {movespeed}s deal an additional {maxhealthpercent}% Bow Shot {attr:physdmg} 
• Extra damage can Stack up to {stacknumber}x

abilities.name: Inner Fire
abilities.description: Every Bow Shot fires a triangle of 3 piercing arrows for the next {duration} seconds. Side arrows deal {maxhealthpercent}% of Bow Shot damage (increases with each level of the ability).
abilities.shortDescription:
• Piercing Triple Bow Shots for {duration}s
• Side Arrows deal {maxhealthpercent}% Bow Shot Damage

abilities.name: Chop
abilities.description: Melee basic attack dealing {damage} {attr:physdmg}.
abilities.shortDescription: • Basic Attack: {damage} {attr:physdmg}

abilities.name: Double Pain
abilities.description: Melee cleave attack dealing {damage} {attr:endmg} and applying {status:bleed} to all enemies. {status:bleed} drains 1% of target's {attr:hp} over 5 seconds.
abilities.shortDescription:
• 100% Cleave: {damage} {attr:endmg}
• {status:bleed}: 1% of target's Health over 5s

abilities.name: Smash & Grab
abilities.description: Wedge-shaped AOE that pulls all enemy units to Grux and deals {damage} {attr:endmg}. Enemies will be stunned for the duration of the pull.
abilities.shortDescription:
• AOE Pull: {damage} {attr:endmg}
• Stuns Enemies during the Pull

abilities.name: Charge
abilities.description: Grux charges forward 1200 units dealing {damage} {attr:endmg} to all enemies in his path.
abilities.shortDescription:
• Dash (1200u Range): {damage} {attr:endmg}
• Pass through Enemies and Minions

abilities.name: Warlord's Challenge
abilities.description: Grux stuns all nearby enemies for {stunduration} seconds and gains {status:bleed} and {bonusdamage} {attr:physdmg} on basic attacks for {ultduration} seconds.
abilities.shortDescription:
• AOE Stun for {stunduration}s
• Bonus Damage ({movespeed} {attr:physdmg}) and {status:bleed} on Chop for 8s
